data.description:
About this game:
-It is an adventure level-based game featuring FPS, roguelite elements. 
-The player plays an adventurer, who explores the ancient Egyptian tombs in a parallel world, and goes deep into the huge underground world to find the legendary secret treasure.
-Every level is generated randomly, each new restart after each failure is a brand-new experience. 
-Players can find all kinds of weapons, as well as artifacts with special abilities. The combination of different weapons and abilities will  will lead different game strategies and bring unique customs clearance experience.

Various Weapons:
-Classic pistols, Scorpion Submachine Gun, SawnOff Shotgun, etc.
-Crazy Flamethrowers, Explosive Crossbows, Fuel Rod Guns, etc.
-Plasma pistol, Okan Laser, Gravity Gun, etc.

Powerful ancient Artifacts:
-Mask of Osiris - Weaking the attacker.
-Horus's Wristband - Causing bullet time.
-Ankh' Guardian - Providing blood sucking ability.
-Element Ring - Debuffing the monsters with negative effect, such as freezing, petrifying and burning.
-And so on.

Monsters
-Slowly moving mummies.
-The rampaging cemetery guards.
-Crowds of scarabs.
-Cannibal scorpions that corrode everything.
-The huge statue of Anubis.
-The powerful and terrible Pharaohs.
-And so on.
